attributes.action: It should be optional to send children back to school in September
attributes.additional_details: Due to pandemic,  also flu season in coming months, parents are worried to send their kids to school.
attributes.background: From September, it should be parents's choice to send their children school.if they feel safe to do so. There shouldn't be any fine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300399
